items.field_deck: Artificial intelligence involves machines programmed to learn and reason.
items.field_summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) is an emerging technology where machines are programmed to learn, reason, and perform in ways that simulate human intelligence. Although AI technology took a dramatic leap forward, the ability of machines to automate manual tasks has been around for a long time. Today’s AI can analyze vast amounts of data to identify patterns and trends, providing insights to improve decisions in areas like resource allocation and risk management. Follow your agency’s guidance on security and best practices when using AI.
items.legislation_title: Executive Order 14110: Safe, Secure, and Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence
items.field_legislation_title: Executive Order 14110: Safe, Secure, and Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence

field_featured_resources.field_featured_resource_summary: Ensuring the U.S. leads in safe, secure, and trustworthy artificial intelligence innovation to harness the opportunities of AI while mitigating its risks.
